articles.description: USA face India in the Men's T20 World Cup in New York - follow text updates, video highlights and radio commentary.
articles.title: USA vs India LIVE: ICC T20 World Cup 2024 - cricket score, commentary, video highlights & updates

articles.description: England coach Matthew Mott hopes Josh Hazlewood’s comments about possibly manipulating net run-rate to knock England out of the T20 World Cup were in jest.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: England coach Matthew Mott hopes Josh Hazlewood comments were a joke

articles.description: In the eyes of many pundits, fans and even players, this week's US Open is Scottie Scheffler's to lose given his dominant start to 2024.
articles.title: US Open 2024: Rory McIlroy says Scottie Scheffler is guy to beat at Pinehurst

articles.description: England midfielder Adam Wharton says being included in England’s 26-man squad for Euro 2024 is "surreal" and "a dream come true".
articles.title: Euro 2024: England call-up surreal but a dream come true says Adam Wharton

articles.description: Who will win, who might spring a surprise and how will England and Scotland do? BBC pundits predict what will happen at the 2024 European Championship.
articles.title: Who will win Euro 2024: BBC pundits make their European Championship predictions

articles.description: Spaniards Carlos Alcaraz and Rafael Nadal will team up as doubles partners at the Olympic Games in Paris.
articles.title: Paris Olympics 2024: Carlos Alcaraz and Rafael Nadal to be doubles partners

articles.description: Jerry West, the basketball legend whose silhouette inspired the iconic NBA logo, has died aged 86, the Los Angeles Clippers confirm.
articles.title: Jerry West: Los Angeles Lakers legend and NBA logo muse dies aged 86

articles.description: French midfielder Tanguy Ndombele will leave Tottenham after the mutual termination of his contract, say the Premier League club.
articles.title: Tanguy Ndombele: French midfielder to leave Tottenham

articles.description: Seven years after being released by Aberdeen, Lawrence Shankland could lead the line for Scotland in Euro 2024's opening game.
articles.title: Scotland at Euro 2024: Lawrence Shankland, from reject to Munich

articles.description: Tiger Woods says he has already "putted off many greens" in practice at the US Open, while defending champion Wyndham Clark says their pace is "borderline".
articles.title: US Open 2024: Tiger Woods says speed of Pinehurst greens will lead to 'war of attrition'
